description: Main entry point for a Flutter application, setting up themes, routes, and initial environment configuration.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter app, responsible for theme and routing setup.

classes.name: ProcessingScreen
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the processing screen, with the real implementation in capture_screen.dart.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes environment variables and runs the app.

methods.name: _electricOrangeTheme
methods.description: Defines a custom dark theme with vibrant orange accents for the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method of MyApp, returning a MaterialApp with theme and routes.
